trans-unit.source: Specifies a column in which each cell contains a check box for representing a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: Especifica uma coluna em que cada célula contém uma caixa de verificação para representar um valor booleano.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridBoolColumn derives from the `abstract` class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.
trans-unit.target: DataGridBoolColumn deriva de `abstract` classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: At run time, the DataGridBoolColumn contains check boxes in each cell that have three states by default: checked (`true`), unchecked (`false`), and <xref:System.DBNull.Value>.
trans-unit.target: No momento de execução DataGridBoolColumn contém caixas de verificação em cada célula, que tem três Estados por predefinição: marcada (`true`), desmarcada (`false`) e <xref:System.DBNull.Value>.</xref:System.DBNull.Value>

trans-unit.source: To use two-state check boxes, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar as caixas de verificação de dois Estados, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: Properties added to the class include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades de adicionar à classe de incluem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties specify the value underlying each of the column's states.
trans-unit.target: Estas propriedades, especifique o valor subjacente cada um dos Estados da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When using this overload to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>, be sure to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Quando utilizar esta sobrecarga para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>Certifique-se definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>valor para o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>de <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn"> </xref> com especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> must be associated with a data source that contains <xref:System.Boolean> values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>tem de ser associado a uma origem de dados que contém <xref:System.Boolean>valores.</xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>

trans-unit.source: To get a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>, first use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> to return the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>primeiro utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>para devolver o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> adequado</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> to return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>devolver um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> to return the specific <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for the column.
trans-unit.target: Por último, utilize o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>para devolver o específicos <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>para a coluna.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> associated with the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> associada à coluna.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>, and specifying whether the column style is a default column.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn"> </xref> com especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>e especificar se o estilo de coluna é uma coluna predefinida.

trans-unit.source: To get a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>, first use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> to return the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>primeiro utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>para devolver o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> adequado</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> to return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>devolver um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> to return the specific <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for the column.
trans-unit.target: Por último, utilize o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>para devolver o específicos <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>para a coluna.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> associated with the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> associada à coluna.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the column as the default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para especificar a coluna como predefinição; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a request to interrupt an edit procedure.
trans-unit.target: Inicia um pedido para interromper um procedimento de edição.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in which an operation is being interrupted.
trans-unit.target: O número de linha em que uma operação está a ser interrompida.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether null values are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se valores null são permitidos.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to false, the check boxes in the column have only two states: checked (`true`) and unchecked (`false`).
trans-unit.target: Quando esta propriedade for definida como false, as caixas de verificação na coluna tem apenas dois Estados: marcada (`true`) e desmarcada (`false`).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if null values are allowed, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se valores null são permitidos, caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull*> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull*>propriedade é alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a request to complete an editing procedure.
trans-unit.target: Inicia um pedido para concluir um procedimento de edição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> of the edited column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref> da coluna editada.

trans-unit.source: The number of the edited row.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha editado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the editing procedure committed successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o procedimento de edição consolidadas com êxito; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Notifies a column that it must relinquish the focus to the control it is hosting.
trans-unit.target: Notifica uma coluna que tem a relinquish o foco para o controlo que está a alojar.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the cell for editing a value.
trans-unit.target: Prepara a célula para um valor de edição.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the typical implementation of this method (as described in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> class), the Edit method does not site a control for editing the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário da implementação típica deste método (conforme descrito no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>classe), o método de edição não do site um controlo para editar o valor da célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Instead, a check box is drawn when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.Paint%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, uma caixa de verificação é desenhada quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.Paint%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.Paint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> of the edited cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref> da célula editada.

trans-unit.source: The row number of the edited cell.
trans-unit.target: O número de linha da célula editado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which the control is to be sited.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> no qual o controlo está a ser sited.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value is read only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor é lido apenas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the cell.
trans-unit.target: O texto a apresentar na célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to show the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para mostrar a célula; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Enters a <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"></xref> into the column.
trans-unit.target: Introduz um <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"> </xref> na coluna.

trans-unit.source: To set the actual value used when entering a null value, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o valor real utilizado quando os introduzir um valor nulo, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull*>propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the actual value used when setting the value of the column to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor real utilizado ao definir o valor da coluna a <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The FalseValue, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A> properties determine the actual values pushed into the data source.
trans-unit.target: O FalseValue <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>propriedades determinam os valores reais enviados para a origem de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value, typed as <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: O valor, escrito como <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue*> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue*>propriedade é alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value at the specified row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da linha especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> for the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: The row number.
trans-unit.target: O número de linha.

trans-unit.source: The value, typed as <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: O valor, escrito como <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a cell in a column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura de uma célula numa coluna.

trans-unit.source: The height of the column.
trans-unit.target: A altura da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default is 16.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 16.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height used when resizing columns.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura utilizada quando redimensionar colunas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that draws on the screen.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> que desenha no ecrã.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the value to be drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém o valor a ser desenhado para o ecrã.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The height used to automatically resize cells in a column.
trans-unit.target: A altura utilizada para redimensionar automaticamente células numa coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets the optimum width and height of a cell given a specific value to contain.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a ideal largura e altura de uma célula fornecida um valor específico que contém.

trans-unit.source: The GetPreferredSize method allows you to resize the column based on the value displayed.
trans-unit.target: O método GetPreferredSize permite-lhe redimensionar a coluna com base no valor apresentado.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a cell contains an especially large value, you can use the GetPreferredSize method to return the optimum size of the cell based on the value.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se uma célula contém um valor especialmente grande, pode utilizar o método GetPreferredSize para repor o tamanho ideal da célula baseado no valor.

trans-unit.source: The optimum size takes into account not only the size of the string, but also the font used to display it.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho ideal tem em consideração, não apenas o tamanho de cadeia, mas o tipo de letra utilizado para apresentá-la.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that draws the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> que desenha a célula.

trans-unit.source: The value that must fit in the cell.
trans-unit.target: O valor que deve encaixar-se na célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the drawing information for the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que contém as informações de desenho de célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the actual value used when setting the value of the column to <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor real utilizado ao definir o valor da coluna a <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify what text will be displayed by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Também pode especificar o texto que será apresentado ao definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A> property must be set to true to enter null values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A>propriedade tem de ser definida como verdadeiro para introduzir valores nulos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, NullValue, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A> properties determine the actual values pushed into the data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, NullValue, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>propriedades determinam os valores reais enviados para a origem de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value, typed as <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: O valor, escrito como <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Draws the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn"></xref> with the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> and row number.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn"> </xref> com o fornecido <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> e o número de linha.

trans-unit.source: This method paints the background with the background color in the graphics object passed in.
trans-unit.target: Este método desenha a imagem de fundo com a cor de fundo do objeto de gráficos transmitido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to draw to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para desenhar a.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: O delimitadora <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> a pintura em.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row referred to in the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha referido nos dados subjacentes.

trans-unit.source: Draws the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn"></xref> with the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, row number, and alignment settings.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn"> </xref> com o fornecido <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>, número de linha e definições de alinhamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to draw to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para desenhar a.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: O delimitadora <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> a pintura em.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table being referred to.
trans-unit.target: O número de linha na tabela de dados subjacente que está a ser referida.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether to align the content to the right.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se pretende alinhar o conteúdo para a direita.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content is aligned to the right, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o conteúdo está alinhado à direita, caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn"></xref> with the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, row number, <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Draws the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn"></xref> with the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, row number, <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Paints the check box in the column.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a caixa de verificação na coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to draw to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para desenhar a.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: O delimitadora <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> a pintura em.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table being referred to.
trans-unit.target: O número de linha na tabela de dados subjacente que está a ser referida.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> used to paint the background color.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> utilizado para a cor de fundo de pintura.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> used to paint the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> utilizado para a cor de primeiro plano de pintura.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether to align the content to the right.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se pretende alinhar o conteúdo para a direita.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content is aligned to the right, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o conteúdo está alinhado à direita, caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of a specified row.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor de uma linha especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> for the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: The row number.
trans-unit.target: O número de linha.

trans-unit.source: The value to set, typed as <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: O valor para definir, escritas como <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the actual value used when setting the value of the column to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor real utilizado ao definir o valor da coluna a <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, and TrueValue properties determine the actual values pushed into the data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, e propriedades de TrueValue determinam os valores reais enviados para a origem de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value, typed as <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: O valor, escrito como <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue*> property value is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue*>valor da propriedade é alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue*>
